Description: Rectangular limestone tomb-relief: depicting Remu and Tjentet seated on either side of an offering-table with inscriptions above and below.
Curator's comments: Bibliography: B. Porter & R. Moss, 'Topographical Bibliography of Ancient Egyptian Hieroglyphic Texts, Reliefs and Paintings' IIIMemphis: A, Abu Rawash to Abusir (Oxford: Clarendon Press), 302.
Bibliographic references: James 1961 / Hieroglyphic texts from Egyptian stelae, etc. Part 1 (pl.16)
Condition: Good; there is some flaking through the action of salt.
